text: Rafael Gomes de Oliveira (born April 26, 1990 in Sao Paulo, Brazil), known as Rafinha, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Ermis Aradippou. == Honours == ===Club=== ;Operário Ferroviário *Campeonato Brasileiro Série C: 2018 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Costa Rica Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Indonesia Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Costa Rica Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Indonesia Category:Red Bull Brasil players Category:São Paulo FC players Category:Guarani FC players Category:Ceará Sporting Club players Category:América Futebol Clube (RN) players Category:Portimonense S.C. players Category:Operário Ferroviário Esporte Clube players Category:Cafetaleros de Chiapas footballers Category:C.S.
